adoptslot1_ltt.br: You need to have at least 1 fame star to unlock this slot.

adoptslot2_ltt.br: You need to have at least 2 fame stars to unlock this slot.

adoptslot3_ltt.br: You need to have at least 3 fame stars to unlock this slot.

adoptslot4_ltt.br: You need to have at least 4 fame stars to unlock this slot.

adoptslot5_ltt.br: You need to have at least 5 fame stars to unlock this slot.

zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to open the Zoopedia and get information about this entity.

research_button_ltt.br: Click to start researching this entity.

zookeeper_rec_button_ltt.br: Click to get zookeeper recommendations for this animal, including foliage, food, and toys.

biome_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display biome brush options based on a specific biome type.

terrain_objects_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display terrain objects based on their associated biome.

animal_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display animals based on their associated biome.

animal_objects_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display animal-related objects based on their research status.

construction_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display objects based on their theme or research status.

overheadcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the overview map, which allows you to jump directly to any exhibit or specific zoo area.

buildingcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to an overhead view that allows you to build exhibits and place animals and objects in your zoo.

firstpersoncameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to first person view, where you can walk around your zoo like a guest and perform zookeeper and maintenance tasks.

photocameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the Photo Safari view, where you can take photographs of the animals and objects in your zoo.

fossilcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to Fossil Finding and search for extinct animal fossils in your zoo.

tranqcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to Dino Tranquilization mode if you need to handle a rampaging dino.

curecameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to Disease Curing and research cures for animal diseases.

text.b: Are you sure you want to Exit Zoo Tycoon 2?

cancel_exit_zoo_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel and return to the game.

exit_zoo_ltt.br: Click to exit the game and return to Windows.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo.

delete_camera_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos from your camera. This does not delete photos in photo albums.

delete_camera_pics_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deletion of all photos from your camera.

new_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the creation of a new profile and return to Profile Manager.

profile_create_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

delete_profile_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

delete_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of the selected player profile and return to Profile Manager.

create_new_album_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new photo album, where you can view and organize the photos you've taken of your zoo.

confirm.create_new_album_cancel_button_stt: Cancel creating a new photo album

create_new_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel creating a new photo album and return to the Photo Album Manager.

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this photo album. This deletes all photos included in this photo album.

delete_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deleting the selected photo album and return to the Photo Album Manager.

color.b: Save your game before returning to the main menu?

save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to save the current game and display the main menu.

no_save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue without saving and return to the main menu.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to return to the current game.

sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you earn is automatically added to your bank account.

no_sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the sale of this object.

text.b: Decline photo challenge?
Fire this staff member?

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire the selected staff member.

no_fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel firing the selected staff member.

delete_game_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this previously saved game.

delete_game_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of this previously saved game.

text.b: You must restart Zoo Tycoon 2
Do you wish to Save and Exit?

closealbummananger_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog box.

cancel_photochallenge_button_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog and continue the photo challenge.

decline_photochallenge_button_ltt.br: Click to close this dialog and decline this photo challenge.

text.b: Save current game before loading a new one?

save_current_button_ltt.br: Click to save and continue to load a saved game.

decline_save_button_ltt.br: Click to continue to the Load Game screen without saving.

text.b: Overwrite saved game?

overwrite_button_ltt.br: Click to overwrite the selected saved game.

decline_overwrite_button_ltt.br: Click to not overwrite the selected saved game.

text.b: %text%

confirm.graphic_settings_confirmation_label: Would you like to keep these new graphics settings? Reverting in %s seconds.

graphic_settings_confirmation_ok_button_.br: Click to accept the new graphics settings.

graphic_settings_confirmation_close_butt.br: Click to go back to the last settings.

text.b: Warning: this action will delete the path under your zoo's entrance, which may confuse your guests!
Warning: this action may eject guests from their vehicles!

delete_pic_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel deletion of the selected photo.

text.b: Warning: Objects in tanks bounded by this wall may be sold as a result of this action!
Warning: Shows associated with the highlighted platform will be deleted as a result of this action!
Warning: Nonshow objects in this tank may be sold as a result of this action!
Show tanks cannot be merged.
Are you sure you want to discard the changes to this show?

cancel_edit_show_confirmation_ok_button_.br: Click to close the show mixer and discard any changes made to the show.

confirm.cancel_edit_show_confirmation_close_butt: Cancel and do not discard changes

color.b: Continue and Do Not Discard Changes

cancel_edit_show_confirmation_close_butt.br: Click to continue editing the show.

text.b: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this show or break?

delete_show_confirmation_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to permanently delete this show or break.

confirm.delete_show_confirmation_close_button_st: Cancel and do not delete segment

delete_show_confirmation_close_button_lt.br: Click to cancel deletion of the show or break.

text.b: Warning: This action may affect shows in this tank!

add_show_confirmation_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to close the show currently being performed and edit a new show in the show mixer.

color.b: Do Not Add a New Show

add_show_confirmation_close_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel addition of a new show.

text.b: Are you sure you want to close the show currently being performed?

edit_show_confirmation_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to close the show currently being performed and edit the selected show in the show mixer.

edit_show_confirmation_close_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel editing of show.

text.b: Are you sure you want to close the show currently being performed?

animal_status_info_ltt.br: Click to view the Animal Status panel.

animal_needs_info_ltt.br: Click to review the status of the animal's basic and advanced needs.

animal_general_info_ltt.br: Click to view the animal's gender, biome preference, and geographical location.

adoption_button_ltt.br: Click to put this animal up for adoption, so other zoos can consider acquiring it.

release_button_ltt.br: Click to release this animal into the wild. To be eligible to release an animal into the wild, you must first satisfy the animal's basic and advanced needs.

pickup_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo and place it in a new location.

track_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

cure_disease_button_ltt.br: Click to switch to first-person view and search for a cure to this animal's disease.

crate_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to crate the selected animal wherever it is located, which is helpful when an animal escapes.

tranq_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to switch to first-person view and tranquilize the rampaging animal.

pickup_crate_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected crate and animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

uncrate_button_ltt.br: Click to uncrate the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

guest_thoughts_tab_ltt.br: Click to view guests' thoughts as they visit your zoo.

guest_fav_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the current guest's zoo favorites.

guest_general_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the current guest's activities and review his or her basic needs.

pickup_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it's located in your zoo.

track_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected guest wherever he or she is located in the zoo.

zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia topic that describes this object.

pickup_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected guest wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

pickup_building_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected building or structure wherever it is located in your zoo.

sell_building_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit is automatically added to your bank account.

sell_fence_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit is automatically added to your bank account.

pickup_generic_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected object wherever it is located in your zoo.

price_low_ltt.br: Click to set low prices on the items sold at this building.

price_med_ltt.br: Click to set moderate prices on the items sold at this building.

price_high_ltt.br: Click to set expensive prices on the items sold at this building.

building_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the status of the current building.

building_finance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the sales figures for this building.

building_color_tab_ltt.br: Click to change the color of the building trim.

building_income_last_ltt.br: This field displays last month's income.

building_upkeep_last_ltt.br: This field displays last month's upkeep.

building_profit_last_ltt.br: This field displays last month's income.

building_income_current_ltt.br: This field displays this month's income.

building_upkeep_current_ltt.br: This field displays this month's upkeep.

building_profit_current_ltt.br: This field displays this month's profit.

staff_status_button_ltt.br: Click to find out what your staff member is doing right now.

staff_assign_button_ltt.br: Click to check on this staff member's current assignments.

staff_thoughts_button_ltt.br: Click to review this staff member's thoughts throughout the day.

staff_salary_button_ltt.br: Click to display this staff member's salary details.

pickup_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected staff member, wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

track_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected staff member wherever he or she is located in the zoo.

add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select an enclosed area to assign it to this zookeeper - a good way to ensure your "star" animals are well cared for.

remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected animal from this zookeeper's list of assignments.

educator_add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select a podium to assign it to this educator. Educators can't lecture without a podium.

educator_remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected podium from this educator's list of assignments.

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire this staff member.

donation_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Donation Status panel.

donation_by_species_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Donations by Species panel.

biome_icon_ltt.br: This object originates in this type of biome and contributes to making a satisfying habitat for the animals that live there.

animal_biome_icon_ltt.br: This biome is representative of the animal's natural habitat and best satisfies its environment need.

location_icon_ltt.br: This object is commonly found in this part of the world.

animal_location_icon_ltt.br: This animal originates from this part of the world.

open_station_ltt.br: Click to open the station for guests to take tours or rides.

close_station_ltt.br: Click to close the station. No guests can enter when the station is closed.

buy_vehicle_ltt.br: Click to buy the selected vehicle, which is created at the station.

transportation_buy_vehicle_tab_ltt.br: Click to view and purchase vehicles.

transportation_donation_tab_ltt.br: Click to view donations made by guests who enjoyed a tour or ride.

vehicle_track_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected vehicle wherever it is located in the zoo.

vehicle_ride_in_button_ltt.br: Click to ride in this vehicle.

animal_ride_on_button_ltt.br: Click to ride on this animal.

animal_swim_with_button_ltt.br: Click to swim with this animal.

sit_in_bleacher_button_ltt.br: Click to sit in this bleacher.

view_show_from_platform_ltt.br: Click to sit on this platform.

circuitA_tab_ltt.br: Click to view circuit A information.

circuitB_tab_ltt.br: Click to view circuit B information.

circuit_change_direction_ltt.br: Click to change the direction that vehicles run on the circuit.

text.b: Conservation Object
Incomplete Circuit

price_free_ltt.br: Click to let guests enter your zoo without paying an entrance fee.

familytree_tab_ltt.br: Click to view this animal's family tree.

show_donation_tab_ltt.br: Click to view donations made by guests who enjoyed a show.

show_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the status of the current show platform.

show_tab_ltt.br: Click to open the show scheduler to manage or create shows.

open_showplatform_ltt.br: Click to open the show platform for guests to watch shows.

close_showplatform_ltt.br: Click to close the show platform. Guests cannot enter the grandstands when the show platform is closed.

create_show_ltt.br: Click to create a new show.

edit_show_ltt.br: Click to view/edit the selected show.

delete_show_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected show or break.

move_up_ltt.br: Click to move the selected show or break up in the schedule

move_down_ltt.br: Click to move the selected show or break down in the schedule.

insert_break_ltt.br: Click to insert a break in the schedule.

show_donations_by_show_ltt.br: Click to sort donation by individual shows or by all shows

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to assign sweeping trash to the maintenance worker.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to assign emptying trash to the maintenance worker.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to assign cleaning water filters to the maintenance worker.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to assign emptying recycle bins to the maintenance worker.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to assign an animal to this trainer for training.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click and then select an animal to assign it to this trainer for training.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click to remove the selected animal from this trainer's training assignment list.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click to toggle the Trainer panel, and then choose what tricks from this trainer's list you want the selected animal to learn.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to train this animal in First Person mode. To be in a show, a show animal must first be happy and all its needs must be met.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to view the shows assigned to this animal.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click this button to purchase and place another of this item.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click to set this filter to a frequent service schedule.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click to set this filter to a normal service schedule.

font.name: arial
font.br: Click to set this filter to an occasional service schedule.

font.name: arial
font.br: This shows the filter's effectiveness at filtering the water. If the filter's efficiency is low, try increasing the maintenance worker's service schedule, or add more filters.

font.name: arial
font.br: This is the current water cleanliness.

purchase_canopy_button_ltt.br: Click to purchase a canopy for this show platform.

sell_canopy_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the canopy on this show platform.

purchase_tv_button_ltt.br: Click to purchase a TV for this show platform.

sell_tv_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the TV on this show platform.

buy_upgrade_ltt.br: Click to buy the selected show platform upgrade.

sell_upgrade_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected show platform upgrade.

building_cloning_tab_ltt.br: Click to view information for creating extinct animals.

create_animal_ltt.br: Click to create an extinct animal.

building_puzzle_tab_ltt.br: Click to view information for assembling extinct animal fossils.

build_puzzle_ltt.br: Click to assemble an extinct animal fossil.

cure_disease_tab_ltt.br: Click to research cures for animal diseases.

cure_disease_ltt.br: Click to cure an animal disease.

find_fossils_tab_ltt.br: Click to search for fossils in your zoo.

find_fossils_ltt.br: Click to search your zoo for fossils.

maximize_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to display the Object Filters panel, where you can show or hide guests, buildings, fences, or foliage in your zoo.

minimize_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to hide the Object Filters panel.

guest_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the guests in your zoo.

building_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the buildings in your zoo.

fence_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the fences in your zoo.

foliage_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the plants, trees, shrubs, and grasses in your zoo.

emote_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide animal and guest emoticons in your zoo.

filter.guest_view_toggle_button_stt: Show or hide guest view area

color.b: Show or Hide Guest View Area

guest_view_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show the guest view filter to see how your guests view your zoo.

elevated_path_opaque_button_ltt.br: Click to show the elevated paths in your zoo.

elevated_path_not_opaque_button_ltt.br: Click to hide the elevated paths in your zoo.

elevated_path_increace_opaque_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the height at which you see transparent elevated paths.

elevated_path_decreace_opaque_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the height at which you see transparent elevated paths.

filter.elevated_path_opaque_slider_stt: Increase or decrease height of transparency

color.b: Increase or Decrease Height of Transparency

elevated_path_opaque_slider_ltt.br: Click to increase or decrease the height at which you see transparent elevated paths.

show_view_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the Show Timer panel.

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel loading a game and close the Load Game dialog box.

load_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected saved game.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

playchallenge_ltt.br: Click to select a map and create a zoo. You can select specific game challenges, but there are no primary goals.

playfreeform_ltt.br: Click to select a map and create a zoo. You play with unlimited money, and all animals and objects are available.

playcampaign_ltt.br: Click to select a campaign to play. Each campaign has several scenarios with specific goals for you to complete.

gameoptions_ltt.br: Click to change video, sound, and other game options.

downloads_ltt.br: Click to check the Internet for game updates and new content. You can also enable or disable downloaded content.

loadsave_ltt.br: Click to load and play a previously saved game.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected player profile.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

add_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

profile_manger_button_ltt.br: Click to manage your player profiles. You can add new profiles and also load or delete existing ones.

profile_manger_close_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Profile Manager.

font.name: arial
font.b: Developed by Blue Fang Games for Microsoft Corporation.

font.name: arial
font.b: This program is protected by U.S. and international copyright law

tutorial_panel_play_ltt.br: Click to play the Zoo Tycoon 2 tutorials.

tutorial_panel_dont_play_ltt.br: Click to skip the tutorials and play the game.

color.b: Would you like to learn how to play Zoo Tycoon 2?
Would you like to learn how to play Zoo Tycoon 2: Endangered Species?
Would you like to learn how to play Zoo Tycoon 2: Marine Mania?

es_installed_ltt.br: Endangered Species expansion pack is installed.

mm_installed_ltt.br: Marine Mania expansion pack is installed.

open_queue_button_ltt.br: Click to open the message queue and view a list of messages about your zoo.

messages.invalid_for_crossinggate: Place %s on a straight section of road.
messages.no_elevated_tile: You cannot place %s on an elevated path.
messages.no_empty_elevated_tile: You cannot place %s so it overhangs.
messages.no_ramp: You cannot place %s on a ramp.
messages.no_headroom: There is not enough headroom to place %s.
messages.no_placement_in_protected_area: You cannot place %s in a Conservation Area.
messages.no_headroom_path: There is not enough headroom to place the elevated path.
messages.placement_on_shore_only: You can only place %s on a shore.
messages.placement_adjacent_to_tank_wall: You can only place %s next to a wall of a fully enclosed tank.
messages.no_placement_in_tank: You cannot place %s in a tank.
messages.no_placement_in_show_tank: You cannot place %s in a show tank.
messages.place_portal: Place a tank portal so that animals can access your show tank.
messages.placement_adjacent_to_water: You can only place %s next to groundwater or a tank wall.
messages.water_too_shallow: The water there is too shallow for %s.
messages.water_too_deep: The water there is too deep for %s.
messages.must_remain_in_show_tank: You must keep %s in the same show tank.
messages.no_protected_areas_in_tanks: You cannot surround any part of a conservation area with a tank.
messages.one_showplatform_per_tank: You can only place one show platform in a show tank.

message_goto_ltt.br: Click to go to the area from which this message originated.

animal_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the animals in your zoo.

animal_sort_env_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on how well you're meeting each animal's environmental needs.

animal_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on how well you're meeting each animal's hunger needs.

animal_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on how well you're meeting each animal's thirst needs.

animal_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on how well you're meeting each animal's rest needs.

animal_sort_exercise_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on how well you're meeting each animal's exercise needs.

animal_sort_sick_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on your animals' health levels.

animal_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on your animals' happiness levels.

animal_sort_pregnant_ltt.br: Click to sort the list based on which animals are pregnant.

guest_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the guests in your zoo.

guest_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by gender and age.

guest_sort_fav_animal_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by their favorite animal.

guest_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well you're meeting their rest needs.

staff_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of staff working in your zoo.

vehicle_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the vehicles in your zoo.

vehicle_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of vehicles by type.

vehicle_sort_current_capacity_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of vehicles based on each vehicle's current capacity.

vehicle_sort_total_capacity_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of vehicles based on total vehicle capacity.

vehicle_sort_status_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of vehicles based on current status.

animal_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by species type.

staff_sort_task_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff based on tasks.

staff_sort_assign_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff members based on assignments.

staff_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff by type -- zookeeper, maintenance worker, and so on.

guest_sort_thought_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on their thoughts about your zoo.

guest_sort_bathroom_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on who needs to go to the restroom and who doesn't.

guest_sort_amusement_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well you're meeting their amusement needs.

guest_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well you're meeting their thirst needs.

guest_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well you're meeting their hunger needs.

guest_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests based on how well you're meeting their happiness needs.

animal_sort_hygiene_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well you're meeting their hygiene needs.

animal_sort_privacy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well you're meeting their privacy needs.

animal_sort_social_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well you're meeting their social needs.

animal_sort_stimulation_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals based on how well you're meeting their stimulation needs.

donation_box_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the donation boxes in your zoo.

donation_box_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of donation boxes by type.

donation_box_sort_months_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of donation boxes based on months in operation

donation_box_sort_profit_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of donation boxes based on total profit.

donation_box_sort_avg_profit_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of donation based on total average profit.

building_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the buildings in your zoo.

buildinge_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of vehicles by type.

building_sort_months_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of buildings based on months in operation.

building_sort_profit_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of buildings based on profit.

building_sort_avg_profit_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of buildings based on average profit.

donation_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the donation boxes in your zoo.

full_screen_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in full-screen mode.

windowed_screen_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a window, with your desktop still visible.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide bar to adjust the level of environment detail. Note that increased detail may slow game performance.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide bar to adjust the level of shadow detail. Note that increased detail may slow game performance.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide bar to adjust the level of object detail displayed in terrains. These include small tufts of grass, rocks, and other terrain objects specific to each biome type.

exit_dowload_button_ltt.br: Click to exit the Downloads screen and return to the game.

apply_button_ltt.br: Click to apply selected changes and exit.

exit_options_button_ltt.br: Click to exit the Game Options screen and cancel changes.

master_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide to adjust the master volume, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

music_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the volume of the music that plays when menus display.

music_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the volume of the music that plays when menus display.

music_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide to adjust the volume of the music that plays when menus display.

misc_panel_tab_ltt.br: Click to change Zoo Guest Mode and Message of the Day options.

misc_motd_button_ltt.br: Select to allow the game to connect to the Internet to download new messages that display on the main menu.

enable_content_ltt.br: Select to enable or disable downloaded content from the Internet for use in the game.

show_content_ltt.br: Select to open the directory where new downloaded content is stored.

setting_slider_thumb_ltt.br: Slide to adjust this video detail setting.

setting_slider_higher_ltt.br: Click to increase the video detail setting.

setting_slider_lower_ltt.br: Click to decrease the video detail setting.

soundmode_16bit_ltt.br: Select to play sounds in 16-bit mode.

soundmode_8bit_ltt.br: Select to play sounds in 8-bit mode.

twod_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the 2D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects and menu music.

twod_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the 2D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects and menu music.

twod_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide to adjust the 2D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects and menu music.

threed_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the 3D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects.

threed_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the 3D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects.

threed_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide to adjust the 3D SFX volume, which includes environment sound effects.

download_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to start downloading this item. To cancel, click while downloading.

custom_detail_button_ltt.br: Select button to choose advanced detail settings.

high_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play the game using the highest video quality. This setting provides maximum video detail and may slow game performance.

medium_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play the game with medium detail. This setting provides medium video detail to maintain game performance.

low_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play the game in low detail. This setting lowers video detail to increase game performance.

misc_mouse_look_button_ltt.br: Select to remove viewing constraints on the mouse while in Zoo Guest Mode.

options.yes_vince_button_stt: Click to configure customer feedback options

color.b: Click To Configure Customer Feedback Options

yes_vince_button_ltt.br: Click to enable/disable participation in the Microsoft Customer Experience Improvement Program.

album_selecter_button_ltt.br: Click to select a new or existing photo album.

createnew_button_ltt.br: Click to create and name a new photo album.

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo album.

clearall_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos in this photo album.

delete_all_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos from the camera.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo.

move_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to move the selected photo to the current photo album.

save_html_button_ltt.br: Click to export the selected photo album to an HTML file that you can share on the Internet.

prevpage_button_ltt.br: Click to view the previous page in the photo album.

nextpage_button_ltt.br: Click to view the next page in the photo album.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to close the photo album and return to the game.

return_to_album_ltt.br: Click to return to the photo album.

large_pic_ltt.br: Click to select a photo, or double-click to enlarge it. Once selected, move the photo to an album or delete it.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to use the selected photo album and return to the main Photo Album screen.

accept_button_ltt.br: Click to accept this game challenge.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline this game challenge.

choice_button_ltt.br: Click to accept this game choice.

color.b: Do you wish to continue playing this scenario?

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

continue_next_button_ltt.br: Click to play the next scenario.

no_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to exit to the main menu.

color.b: Do you wish to restart the scenario?

challenge_failed_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing the scenario.

challenge_won_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing the scenario.

font.name: arial
font.b: Press SPACEBAR to take a photo

photo_zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to open Zoopedia and obtain information about Photo Safari.

help_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Help screen.

color.b: Click the X button to close the panel.
Press the C key to toggle the camera on and off.
Press SPACEBAR to take a photo.

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Save Game dialog box.

save_button_ltt.br: Click to save game using the name entered.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

pgb_construction_ltt.br: Click to view the Construction panel, where you buy fences, paths, buildings, benches, fountains, trash cans, and more.

construction_fence_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Fences tab, which shows the fences and gates you can buy.

construction_fenceplacement_octagon_mode.br: Click to start fence placement. Move the mouse to adjust the size of the octagonal fence, and then click to finish.

construction_fenceplacement_rectangle_mo.br: Click to start fence placement. Move the mouse to adjust the size of the rectangular fence, and then click to finish.

construction_fenceplacement_clickdrag_mo.br: Click to place one section of fence.
Click and move the mouse to construct multiple fence sections. Click again to complete the fence.

construction_fenceplacement_rubberband_m.br: Click to start fence placement. Click again to place more fence sections. Right-click to finish.

construction_path_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Paths tab, which shows the different types of paths you can buy.

pgb_animal_ltt.br: Click to view the Animals panel, where you can adopt animals or buy animal enrichment objects, shelters, and food.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline the selected adoptable animal and exchange it for another.

decline_all_button_ltt.br: Click to decline all the adoptable animals and exchange them for others.

female_button_ltt.br: Click to view the female animals you can adopt.

male_button_ltt.br: Click to view the male animals you can adopt.

animal_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the animals available for adoption.

animal_enrichment_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the toys and other enrichment objects you can buy your animals.

animal_food_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the types of food you can buy your animals.

animal_shelter_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the types of shelters you can buy your animals.

pgb_structures_ltt.br: Click to view the Structures panel, where you can buy buildings and scenery items.

structures_scenery_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the scenery items you can buy for your zoo. These include benches, trash cans, decorative arches, fountains, and statues.

structures_building_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the buildings you can buy for your zoo. These include food and beverage stands, restaurants, ATMs, and restrooms.

pgb_terrain_ltt.br: Click to view the landscaping tools. Use these to place trees, plants, and rocks, and also create hills, valleys, and lakes.

terrain_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the six terrain modification tools. Use these to flatten or smooth surfaces and also create cliffs, mountains, and plateaus.

hill_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Hill brush, and then click the terrain to create hills.

valley_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Valley brush, and then click the terrain to create valleys of varying depths.

flatten_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Flatten Terrain brush, and then click the terrain to flatten raised surfaces and create plateaus.

smooth_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Smooth Terrain brush, and then click the terrain to smooth rough surfaces or create smooth hills.

cliff_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Cliff brush, and then click the terrain to create cliffs.

terrain_biome_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a biome type, and then use the mouse to paint in plants and trees specific to that biome.

terrain_trees_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to include trees in the brush when painting terrain.

terrain_plants_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to include plants in the brush when painting the terrain.

terrain_rocks_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to include rocks in the brush when painting terrain.

previousbiome_ltt.br: Click to view the previous biome.

nextbiome_ltt.br: Click to view the next biome.

brushincrease_ltt.br: Click to increase the area the Biome Brush or Terrain Modification tool paints each time you click the mouse.

brushdecrease_ltt.br: Click to decrease the area the Biome Brush or Terrain Modification tool paints each time you click the mouse.

terrain_tree_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the different types of trees you can buy.

terrain_plant_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the different types of plants you can buy.

terrain_rock_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the different kinds of rocks you can buy.

pgb_staff_ltt.br: Click to view the Staff panel to hire staff, including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

staff_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose staff members including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

keeper_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a male or female zookeeper. Zookeepers take care of all your animals' needs.

mw_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire maintenance workers. Maintenance workers empty trash cans and pick up animal droppings.

educator_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire educators. Educators give educational talks about animals to guests, which satisfy guests' knowledge needs.

zoom_in_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom in for a closer look at your zoo. You can also use the mouse wheel.

zoom_out_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom out for a higher-level look at your zoo. You can also use the mouse wheel.

rotate_counter_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo counter-clockwise.

rotate_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo clockwise.

multiinfo_button_ltt.br: Click to access information about your animals, guests, and staff.

undo_button_ltt.br: Click to undo your last action.

zoo_fame_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about zoo fame.

recycle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the pointer to a bulldozer, and then click any zoo object to delete it. You'll receive cash for recycling most objects.

scenario_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about the current goals and challenges.

options_button_ltt.br: Click to display the Game Options menu, where you can save games, load games, return to the main menu, or exit the game.

photo_album_button_ltt.br: Click to view and organize photos taken in Photo Safari mode.

rotate_clock_ltt.br: Click to rotate the selected object clockwise before placing it.

rotate_counter-clock_ltt.br: Click to rotate selected object counter-clockwise before placing it.

maximize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to expand the Game Controls panel to its maximum size, displaying the most information possible but obscuring some of your zoo.

minimize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to reduce the Game Controls panel to its minimum size, obscuring your view of your zoo as little as possible.

zoo_money_button_ltt.br: Click to display your zoo's income and expense report.

pause_button_ltt.br: Click to toggle between playing and pausing.

text.b: GAME PAUSED

construction_tankplacement_rectangle_mod.br: Click to start tank placement, and then move the mouse to adjust the size of the rectangular tank. Click again to finish.

construction_tankplacement_octagon_mode_.br: Click to start tank placement, and then move the mouse to adjust the size of the octagonal tank. Click again to finish.

structures_transportation_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the transportation systems your guests can use to take tours and travel around your zoo.

structures_elevatedpath_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the elevated path options you can buy for your zoo.

color.b: Ramp Up Elevated Path Placement Mode

structures_elevatedpathplacement_rampup_.br: Click to start Ramp Up mode. You can start from the ground or from any elevated path. Right-click to finish.

structures_elevatedpathplacement_flat_mo.br: Click to start elevated path placement. Click again to place more elevated path sections. Right-click to finish.

structures_elevatedpathplacement_rampdow.br: Click to start Ramp Down mode. You can start from the ground or from any elevated path. Right-click to finish.

structures_elevatedpathplacement_raise_l.br: Click to increase the height of elevated path.

structures_elevatedpathplacement_lower_l.br: Click to lower the placement height of elevated path.

text.b: Conservation Area
Calculating View...
Calculating Influence...

structures_skypoleplacement_raise_ltt.br: Click to increase the height of an unplaced sky tram pole.

structures_skypoleplacement_lower_ltt.br: Click to decrease the height of an unplaced sky tram pole.

ditch_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Ditch brush, and then click the terrain to create ditches.

construction_tankplacement_rubberband_mo.br: Click to start tank placement. Click again to place more tank sections. Right-click to finish.

zoo_finance_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about your zoo. These include income and expenses, buildings, awards, donations, and informational graphs.

terrain_tank_tab_ltt.br: Purchase new tank walls or choose a tank tool, and then use the mouse to change the property of an existing tank.

raise_tanks_wall_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Raise Tank Wall tool. Using the circular blue pointer, click the tank wall, and then drag in an upward direction to raise it.

lower_tanks_wall_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Lower Tank Wall tool. Using the circular blue pointer, click the tank wall, and then drag in a downward direction to lower it.

lower_tanks_base_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Lower Tank Floor tool. Using the circular blue pointer, click the tank floor, and then drag in a downward direction to lower it.

raise_tanks_base_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Raise Tank Floor tool. Using the circular blue pointer, click the tank floor, and then drag in an upward direction to raise it.

fill_tank_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Fill Tank tool, and then click the tank you want to fill.

empty_tank_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Empty Tank tool, and then click the tank you want to empty.

structures_show_object_buy_area_ltt.br: On this tab, you can purchase show and tank objects to put in and around your tank.

disease_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to cycle through diseased animals in your zoo, and then click on their picture in the info panel to enter disease curing mode.

rampage_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to cycle through rampaging animals in your zoo, and then click on their picture in the info panel to enter dino tranquilization mode.

minigame_help_button_ltt.br: Click to show the Help topic for this game mode.

minigame_help_minimize_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Help topic and get back to the game!

primary_goals_tab_ltt.br: This tab lists the primary goals for the current scenario.

primary_show_all_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the goals for the current scenario.

primary_show_all_completed_goals_button_.br: Click to view a list of all the goals completed for the scenario.

primary_show_all_uncompleted_goals_butto.br: Click to view a list of all the goals not yet completed for the scenario.

photo_goals_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the Photo Safari challenges, where you use a camera to meet your goals.

introduction_tab_ltt.br: Click to view an introduction to the current goals and challenges.

continue_tutorial_button_ltt.br: Click to continue to the next step of the tutorial.

roadcircuit_incomplete_ltt.br: This road circuit is incomplete. Click the icon to continue placing road.

skycircuit_incomplete_ltt.br: This sky tram circuit is incomplete. Click the icon to continue placing cable.

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close Zoopedia and return to the game.

next_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to go forward to a previously viewed Zoopedia topic.

prev_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to go back to a previously viewed Zoopedia topic.

toc_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia Table of Contents.

export_map_button_ltt.br: Click to export a copy of this map to HTML, so you can share it with other zoo tycoons.

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo overview map and return to the game.

legend_item_ltt.br: Click to show or hide items on the zoo overview map.

info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view and adjust zoo admission price and also check your zoo's operational status.

info_price_down_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the admission price for your zoo, which may result in more guests visiting your zoo.

marketing_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Income & Expense report for your zoo.

graphs_tab_ltt.br: Click to view graphs that chart your zoo's progress in a variety of categories over time.

awards_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the awards your zoo has received.

building_list_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the buildings in your zoo and their economic statistics.

donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations to your zoo.

donations_summary_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations to your zoo.

donations_species_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations to you zoo by species.

zoo_fame_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the summary of zoo fame.

zoo_fame_num_animals_ltt.br: The more animals you have in your zoo, the more famous it becomes. Add animals to increase your zoo fame.

zoo_fame_animal_variety_ltt.br: The more species you have in your zoo, the more famous it becomes. Adopt animals from many different species to become as famous as possible!

zoo_fame_animal_happiness_ltt.br: Even if you have lots of animals from many different species, your zoo won't ever be famous if your animals aren't happy. Meet your animals' needs to keep them happy.

zoo_fame_guest_educated_by_animals_ltt.br: Educational zoos are more famous. Guests are educated by seeing animals in their native habitats. Hiring educators helps, as does grouping compatible biomes.

zoo_fame_guest_entertained_by_animals_lt.br: Guests like having a good view of healthy, happy, and active animals. They also like to see rare and exotic animals. To ensure guests enjoy themselves, make sure that your animals are happy, that they have lots to do, and that guests are able to view them up close.

zoo_fame_guest_average_happiness_ltt.br: Even if your zoo is educational and your animals are entertaining, your zoo won't ever be famous if your guests aren't happy. Meet your guests' needs to keep them happy.

zoo_fame_awards_ltt.br: Your zoo can become more famous by meeting challenges and earning awards. You won't lose this fame.

zoo_fame_animal_release_wild_ltt.br: Releasing animals into the wild increases the fame for your zoo. You won't lose this fame.

zoostatus.graph_value_tab_ltt: Click to view of your zoo's value over time.

graph_profit_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly profit over time.

graph_donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly donations over time.

graph_attendance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly attendance over time.

graph_fame_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's fame and recognition level over time.

graph_members_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of the number of zoo members that have signed up over time.

graph_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the display of graphs to bar graph format.

line_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the display of graphs to line graph format.

open_zoo_ltt.br: Click to open the zoo for guests to enjoy.

close_zoo_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo. No guests visit when the zoo is closed.

price_low_zs_ltt.br: Click to set low prices on entrance.

price_med_zs_ltt.br: Click to set moderate prices on entrance.

price_high_zs_ltt.br: Click to set expensive prices on entrance.

tour_donations_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of tour donations to your zoo.

info_price_up_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the admission price of the zoo. Higher admission prices can lead to having fewer guests with higher expectations.

close_ltt.br: Click to close this panel and return to the main game window.

show_donations_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of show donations to your zoo.

timer_expand_ltt.br: Click to show or hide the show timer display.

scheduler.show_enabler_stt: Click to enable or disable show.

color.b: Click to enable or disable show.

show_enabler_ltt.br: Click to enable or disable this show from the show scheduler.

show_upcoming_ltt.br: This show is scheduled to run next.

accept_show_button_ltt.br: Click to save changes and exit.

decline_show_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel any changes and exit.

edit_show_button_ltt.br: Click to view or edit the current show.

color.b: No animals currently available for show.
Toggle View mode to add animals.

training.new_trick_label: The following trick(s) are unlocked for %s
training.unable_to_train_label: %s has basic needs that have become critical and must take a break from training. Try again later.

gesture.wait_tracer_label: Please wait for %s to get into position

accept_program_button_ltt.br: Click to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program. (Recommended)

decline_program_button_ltt.br: Click to NOT participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program.

exit_panel_button_ltt.br: Click to save your chosen selection and exit.

color.b: We invite you to join the Customer Experience Improvement Program to help us improve the quality, reliability, and performance of Microsoft products.
If you accept, we will collect information about your hardware configuration and how you use this software to identify trends and usage patterns. This information will not be used to identify you.
You can leave this program at any time from the main game menu by selecting Game Options | Customer Feedback Options to return to this dialog.
Click here to learn more about the Customer Experience Improvement Program.
Yes, I am willing to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program. (Recommended)
No, I do not wish to participate.

disease_hint_button_ltt.br: Click to get the next research report for your disease. Ordering more research reduces your reward for finding the cure, but helps you find it more quickly.

puzzlemode.feedback_text: By completing this puzzle, you can create %s at the Extinct Research Lab! Click the check mark to exit the lab.
